name: Cisco Secure Email and Web Manager
description: App integration for Cisco SMA, Secure Email and Web Manager
product_name: Cisco Secure Email and Web Manager

host.description: Hostname or IP address of Cisco SMA

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Search for messages in the spam quarantine

start_date.description: Start date, recommended in ISO format, but most formats accepted (ex: 2001-05-08T08:45:01)

end_date.description: End date, recommended in ISO format, but most formats accepted (ex: 2001-05-08T08:45:01)

limit.description: Max number of records to return

actions.description: Search for messages in Policy, Virus, Outbreak, and other quarantines

start_date.description: Start date, recommended in ISO format, but most formats accepted (ex: 2001-05-08T08:45:01)

end_date.description: End date, recommended in ISO format, but most formats accepted (ex: 2001-05-08T08:45:01)

quarantines.description: Comma-separated list of quarantines to search (Outbreak, Virus, File+Analysis, Unclassified, Policy, <user defined quarantine>)

originating_esa_ip.description: IP address of the ESA that processed the message

limit.description: Maximum number of records to return

envelope_recipient_filter_value.description: Value to filter envelope recipient by

envelope_sender_filter_value.description: Value to filter envelope sender by

quarantine_name.description: Name of quarantine to release from (Outbreak, Virus, File+Analysis, Unclassified, Policy, <user defined quarantine>)
